Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: GenAI helped me fill in gaps I did not understand in class by providing a different approach to the information I was learning

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: The feedback helped me believe I was on the right track when I couldn't ask my teacher. However, I still prefer my teacher's feedback over it when possible

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI gave a broader view and went against the markings of the rubric when giving me feedback, whereas my teacher's feedback was more in-depth and provided some niche insights
